title: launcher stuck on logo then rads error
body: when i double click the launcher it gets stuck on logo then i get rads error i dont have avast so i dont get that message (i have kaspersky) please help

replies.body:
Getting a RADS error usually almost always points to a type of OS Permissions Issue.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to run, but something is blocking it from doing so.  To get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).  Some of the steps may seem fairly simple, but they are crucial in hopefully resolve this issue.

Let me know if you are still seeing some problems!
